structure.unit: COUNTY AND CITY BRIDGES, TUNNELS, AND FERRIES

law.catch_line: Construction and purchase of interstate bridges and tunnels.
law.text: All counties may purchase, construct, or reconstruct bridges over or tunnels under any boundary line stream of this state, and may purchase or obtain by gift or otherwise necessary approaches and other property from the adjoining state or subdivision thereof and from any person in the adjoining state.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 254, effective January 1, 2015. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 938p-1.
